oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Report of ordnance and ordnance stores, 3rd Tennessee Cavalry

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States -- Army -- Tennessee Cavalry Regiments, 3rd; Thornburgh, Duff Green, 1832-1916; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1864; Tennessee -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hand-drawn and handwritten table names each company commander with a report of ordnance in his unit: carbines, pistols, sabres, horse equipment, and statement of condition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States -- Army -- Ordnance Corps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Record Group 21, Adjutant General's Office Records, 1796-1900
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Captains listed: Samuel Pickens, Alexander Slattery, A. H. Wilson, Charles W. Coker, J. P. Brient, J. N. Witt, Wm. Farmer, James A. Goddard, T. D. Tipton, two illegible.
